ygData.subject: A bard tried to PK me...
ygData.msgSnippet: ...on Rallos Zek. He must ve been around 11th lvl or so (conned RED to me at 8th) and he wasn t very effective at killing me. I ran, he followed, whacking me
ygData.messageBody:
...on Rallos Zek. He must've been around 11th lvl or so (conned RED to me
at 8th) and he wasn't very effective at killing me. I ran, he followed,
whacking me on occasion until I bagged my one piece of Banded Mail and he
realized it wasn't worth killing me for a rusty sword (explanation for
those not on the PVP server: You can only loot one item from your victims
and you can NOT loot anything from a container so it's common to see people
letting themselves get hit while they put all their good stuff away.
Ridiculous? Yep. Funny? Indeed!).

I must say though - I was very disappointed that a Bard was trying to
slaughter someone green simply for a piece of equipment, he even had the RP
flag on (for what that's worth) but I guess it takes all sorts eh? ;)

Dud


-----Original Message-----
From: Alexis Muhly [SMTP:acmuhly@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 7:02 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Greetings

From: "Alexis Muhly" <acmuhly@...>

I've just sub'd to the list and wanted to introduce myself. I'm having a
blast playing a Bard and consider this a fine class for someone who wants a
bit of everything ;)

One Question I have is I've seen a Battle Drum mentioned on this
list...I've never heard anyone speak of this instrument..is it made?
dropped? what?

Thanks!

Kagami <Disciples of KILL>
12th Level Bard Karana
